Text: Hooray - we just passed HR 3017 supporting @EPA's brownfields cleanup program. While serving in Colo. legislature, I wrote the state brownfield program law, boosting Denver’s economic rebound and green space expansion. Here in Congress, I worked on the original 2002 federal law.

If you haven't figured out that the #GOPTaxScam is a raw deal for working families by now, just look at the important deductions that are on the chopping block. Tax season will be tougher on average Americans while the ultra-wealthy can line more of their pockets.pic.twitter.com/NehWEbqydP

Wonderful to be reunited with Max Schill, the boy who helped make #21stCenturyCures a reality. I’m so glad he is back in Washington DC as we reflect on the law’s incredible success a year after it passed the House and to advocate for those with #rarediseases.pic.twitter.com/Ju198Tnclg

Nearly a year after its passage, #21stCenturyCures has already facilitated breakthroughs in critical research, and the best is yet to come. At a @HouseCommerce hearing, I'm reflecting on its initial successes and future potential to save millions of lives.pic.twitter.com/5zGK6Ef4k9

Who are some of the people the #GOPTaxScam hits the hardest?
Teachers
… and seniors
… and veterans
… and students
… and people with disabilities and chronic illnesses.

Everyday Americans will be seriously hurt if this terrible bill becomes law.
On @MSNBC, I spoke with @AriMelber on the critical need to renew #CHIP, which could soon be taken away from 100k Colorado kids.pic.twitter.com/40pHw0YjOr

In just a few minutes, I'll be speaking with @AriMelber on @MSNBC about protecting #CHIP. Republicans' failure to renew this insurance program is forcing many Colorado families to face the difficult prospect of losing their kids' coverage.
Every day, more #DREAMers are losing DACA protections and put at risk of deportation. We must #ProtectDREAMers and pass the #DREAMAct before the end of the year.pic.twitter.com/2ssJHekYbN

Spoke with @CONonprofits about their vital work in our community and our shared federal tax policy goals: supporting the Johnson amendment and maintaining the universal charitable deduction -- both threatened by the #GOPTaxScam. #protectgivingpic.twitter.com/6VlJOFfhzH

#DREAMers need us to stand with them. They're our neighbors, classmates, service members, friends and colleagues. We need to #ProtectDreamers through passage of the #DREAMAct before the end of the year. For me, this is non-negotiable. http://bit.ly/2BroSbN .pic.twitter.com/51Jvyr6WAT
Just spoke with @KatyTurNBC about ending #sexualharassment in Congress. Current reporting process must be improved & more transparent.pic.twitter.com/JH2adXe4D8

In a few minutes, I’ll join @KatyTurNBC to discuss sexual #harassment and what needs to be done to prevent it – in Congress as well as other institutions in this country. We need to take concrete, consistent and transparent steps to end this scourge. @MSNBC

#GOPTaxScam has passed the House, but I am proud to have voted against this gift to corporations and the ultra-wealthy. This bill should never become law. Instead, Congress should come together to make our tax code more efficient and more equitable.

Look who’s the poster child for today’s debate on the #GOPTaxScam. The ultra-rich and corporations will benefit from this bill, while millions in the middle class will see their taxes rise. @stevenmnuchin1 and @louiselinton know how to strike a pose!pic.twitter.com/TVsIfRllm0

Rigging the tax system to benefit the ultra-rich leaves the middle class behind, and it has for decades. How many times must the #GOP engage in this dangerous experiment before admitting how much it hurts average Americans? Their latest #GOPTaxScam must never become lawpic.twitter.com/khuaNikpZb
